subtitleNullable: dataset of 9000 companies with its ratings, review count and employee count etc.
descriptionNullable: # **Context** The dataset titled 'Company Ratings and Reviews: 9000 Entities' provides comprehensive information on 9000 companies, including their ratings, reviews, company type, and number of employees. This dataset offers valuable insights into the performance and reputation of a wide range of businesses across various industries. By analyzing the ratings and reviews of these 9000 companies, researchers, analysts, and business professionals can gain a deeper understanding of customer satisfaction, company reputation, and market trends. The dataset also includes company type classifications, which can provide additional context and aid in comparative analyses based on industry sectors. # **Content** The dataset consists of several columns supporting the practices and projects can done through it. In this dataset we are talking about name of the company, their respective ratings, also talks about no of reviews, company type( ctype ), what is the age of the company, where it's located, and the numbers of Indian employees work there. # **Structure** ![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F10946841%2F42defa247068edb2e7cc650d5d703e9b%2FScreenshot%202023-07-08%20100438.png?generation=1688790932374839&alt=media) # **Source** This Dataset is created from www.ambitionbox.com. If you want to learn more, you can visit the Website. image shoutout: Photo by Robert Stump on Unsplash
